name: One Week At Jays
description:
Welcome To Your Job As The Nightwatch At Jays Diner!

Your Job Will Be To Watch Over The Building And The

Animatronics, But Lately The Animatronics Have Been Acting Strangely, So Be Careful!

3/4 Volume Recommended

Patch Notes:

1.0.0: Released

1.0.1: Minor Bug Fixes And Audio Adjustments

1.0.2: Holiday Update And Minor Adjustments

1.0.3: Achievement Update And Minor Adjustments

1.0.4: Reboot Update

1.1.0: Major Menu Changes, Added T̷̜͗h̷͚̤̄e̶͍͚͐̋ ̵̛̲S̴̮͑͘w̵͙̒̈́i̸̦̒t̸͉̠̋̎ċ̵̙h̸̙͌̆

1.1.1: Minor Bug Fixes And Alterations

1.1.2: Added Minor Endgame Content

1.1.3: Added New Game Button

1.1.4: Re-Added Vital Mechanics (Oops!)

1.1.5: Minor Bug Fix, Parity

1.1.6: Custom Night Changes
